headline: The Library Has a New Website
paragraph: You are visiting it right now!

headline: Come to The MILL
paragraph: Workshops start back up in the fall at the library's Making, Innovating, and Learning Laboratory (MILL)

image-caption: Participants in the CDIL summer symposium 2017
headline: Center for Digital Inquiry & Learning (CDIL)
paragraph: The only center of its kind in Idaho, CDIL provides digital scholarship research and learning opportunities on campus for faculty and students.

image-caption: Posters for Gott's Point and Idaho Queered
headline: Documentary Premiere - Thursday @6:30PM at the Kenorthy
paragraph: Join us the Premiere of JAMM Professor Denise Bennett's Gotts Point, a documentary on the death of Vandal Alum Steven Nelson and for previews of the Idaho Queered Oral History project. Donations at the door.
